definition: variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control

sentences.english: The days when European empires dominated the globe had gone.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲帝國統馭全球的時代早已遠去。

sentences.english: The bipolarity is the universal natural definition, dominating all the physical evolvements .
sentences.chinese: 兩極性是宇宙的自然定義，統馭一切物理演化。

sentences.english: All secret powers of nature are at your command.
sentences.chinese: 您統馭着大自然的一切神祕之力。
